9d32daa03935f7fe05d7124d09dc27eebb6d8767.query:
INSERT INTO loyalty_points (customer_id, tenant_id, points)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
                ON CONFLICT (customer_id, tenant_id) DO UPDATE
                SET points = loyalty_points.points + EXCLUDED.points

f08b604b0b11232a001275132cedf7cbbeb29469.query: SELECT points FROM loyalty_points WHERE customer_id = $1 AND tenant_id = $2
